00014 void uiLeaderBoard::displayUILeaderBoard(const GLuint & tempImage)
00015 {
00016         //finding centre of screen
00017         int wc = width / 2;
00018         int hc = height / 2;
00019         int d = 300; // half of width and height of UI screen
00020 
00021         glPushMatrix();
00022         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00023         glPushMatrix();
00024         glLoadIdentity();
00025         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00026         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00027         glLoadIdentity();
00028 
00029         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00030         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00031         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00032         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00033         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00034 
00035         // display menu image at screen centre
00036         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00037         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00038                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00039                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc + d);
00040                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00041                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc - d);
00042                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00043                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc - d);
00044                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00045                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc + d);
00046         glEnd();
00047 
00048         //data will need to be converted to string/unsigned char* in order to put on screen
00049         std::string strName;
00050         const unsigned char * strName1;
00051         std::string strDate;
00052         const unsigned char * strDate1;
00053         std::string strScore;
00054         const unsigned char * strScore1;
00055         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); //sets active to none
00056         glColor3f(0.498f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00057         //for (each entry in leaderboard vector) the rasterposition will need to move down
00058         int y = hc + d - 200;
00059 
00060         //find which is larger, 10 or the size of the vector
00061         size_t size = 0;
00062         if (lboard.size() < 10)
00063                 size = lboard.size();
00064         else
00065                 size = 10;
00066 
00067         for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00068         {
00069                 //preparing strings for rendering
00070                 strName = lboard[i].name;
00071                 strName1 = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char *> (strName.c_str());
00072                 strDate = lboard[i].sDate;
00073                 strDate1 = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char *> (strDate.c_str());
00074                 std::stringstream convert;  //to convert int to string
00075                 convert << lboard[i].nScore;
00076                 strScore = convert.str(); 
00077                 strScore1 = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char *> (strScore.c_str());
00078 
00079                 //rendering
00080                 glRasterPos2i(wc - d + 60, y);
00081                 glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, strName1); 
00082                 glRasterPos2i(wc - d + 200, y);
00083                 glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, strDate1);
00084                 glRasterPos2i(wc - d + 350, y);
00085                 glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, strScore1);
00086                 
00087                 // ready for next line
00088                 y = y - 25;  
00089         }
00090                 
00091         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00092         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00093 
00094         // Reset Perspective Projection
00095         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00096         glPopMatrix();
00097         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00098         glPopMatrix();
00099 }

00101 void uiLeaderBoard::mouseUILeaderBoard(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00102 {
00103         int wc = width / 2;
00104         int hc = height / 2;
00105 
00106         //KM 18/10/2016 click noise - sourced from http://soundbible.com/1705-Click2.html
00107         CEasySound *es;
00108         CSound* clickSound;
00109         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00110         clickSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/Click2-Sebastian-759472264.wav"));
00111 
00112         if ((button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON) && (state == GLUT_DOWN))
00113         {
00114                 //std::cout << "x " << x << ", y " << y << std::endl;
00115                 //return to menu
00116                 if (x >= wc + 168 && x <= wc + 275 && y >= hc +241 && y <= hc+272)
00117                 {
00118                         clickSound->Play();
00119                         gVar.uiLeaderBoard = false;
00120                         gVar.uiMenu = true;
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 }

00125 void uiLeaderBoard::getLeaderBoard() 
00126 {
00127         //leaderboard file
00128         std::ifstream lbFile;
00129         lbFile.open("data/LeaderBoard.txt");
00130         score temp;
00131         std::string lineparts[3];
00132         
00133         if (lbFile.is_open())
00134         {
00135                 while (!lbFile.eof())
00136                 {
00137                         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00138                                 std::getline(lbFile, lineparts[i], ',');
00139                         }
00140                         //eat the newline
00141                         lbFile.ignore();
00142 
00143                         temp.name = lineparts[0];
00144                         temp.sDate = lineparts[1];
00145                         
00146                         //converting score to int
00147                         std::stringstream convert(lineparts[2]); 
00148 
00149                         if (!(convert >> temp.nScore))  //puts value in position
00150                                 temp.nScore = 0;  //if that fails sets to 0
00151 
00152                         //test
00153                         //std::cout << "name " << temp.name << std::endl;
00154                         //std::cout << "date " << temp.sDate << std::endl;
00155                         //std::cout << "score " << temp.nScore << std::endl;
00156 
00157                         //add this score to the vector
00158                         lboard.push_back(temp);
00159                 }
00160                 lbFile.close();
00161         }
00162 
00163         sortLeaderBoard();
00164 }
00165 
00166 void uiLeaderBoard::setLeaderBoard()
00167 {
00168         //for each score in the vector write to the file 
00169         std::ofstream lbFile;
00170         lbFile.open("data/LeaderBoard.txt");
00171 
00172         size_t size = lboard.size();
00173 
00174         for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00175         {
00176                 lbFile << lboard[i].name <<","<< lboard[i].sDate <<","<< lboard[i].nScore << "," ;
00177                 if (i < size - 1) //newline for each except last
00178                         lbFile << "\n";
00179         }
00180 
00181         lbFile.close();
00182 }

00184 void uiLeaderBoard::addLeaderBoard(std::string newName, std::string newDate, int newScore)
00185 {
00186         score temp;
00187         temp.name = newName;
00188         temp.sDate = newDate;
00189         temp.nScore = newScore;
00190 
00191         lboard.push_back(temp);
00192 
00193         sortLeaderBoard();
00194 }
00195 
00196 void uiLeaderBoard::sortLeaderBoard() 
00197 {
00198         //sort largest score first
00199         std::sort(lboard.begin(), lboard.end(), [](const score& lhs, const score& rhs)
00200         {
00201                 return lhs.nScore > rhs.nScore;
00202         });
00203 }
